feature.name: valid_flow_profile_flag
feature.doc: should user add a flag to the latency profile create API in order to set valid bit and enable latency to be measured per pp flow profile

feature.name: valid_end_to_end_aqm_profile
feature.doc: can end to end aqm profile be created

feature.name: probabilistic_mechanism_support
feature.doc: is the probibalistic mark cni/drop mechanism supported (ingress deqeue latency marking)
